attributes.action: Increase awareness of individuals with a stammer
attributes.additional_details: I feel that society is widely unaware of individuals who suffer from stammering and believe that it should be brought into the eye of the public. I have been ridiculed all my life for this and I think its time for a change, I would be very pleased if the government could broaden peoples knowledge about this disorder as it is not very well known. The focus should be aimed at young adults as they tend to be the ones who find it rather amusing. It is indeed a very hard disorder to live with and people should know more about it!
